body: @nealwu This is an unfortunate side effect of automatically choosing the data format [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/edcd29f2dbb4b3eaed387fe17cb5270f867aec42/official/mnist/mnist.py#L107). Maybe we should give people the option to override the data format via flag so they can train on GPU and predict on CPU.
